item.title: Simu Liu Decries the 'Backslide' of Asian Representation in Hollywood: 'We're Fighting a Deeply Prejudiced System'
item.description: Liu will reprise his Marvel role as Shang-Chi in next year's 'Avengers: Doomsday'

item.title: Gypsy-Rose Blanchard Reveals Why She Wears Wigs After She 'Had to Cut' Her Hair 'Really Short'
item.description: "I'm giving my hair a fresh start so it can grow long again," she shared on Instagram

item.title: Ted Danson Admits He Was 'Giggling the Whole Time' Working With Wife Mary Steenburgen on “A Man on the Inside” (Exclusive)
item.description: Married 30 years, the superstar couple, who play love interests on the hit series, continue to be each other's biggest fans
